ingredients: 1 cup red lentils, rinsed and drained
cookingMethod: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until softened. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the cumin, smoked paprika, oregano, and cayenne pepper, and cook for another minute. Add the lentils and vegetable broth, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until the lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-6 minutes per side, until cooked through. In a bowl, combine the mangoes, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, honey, and lime juice. Serve the salmon topped with the mango salsa.

Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Brush the salmon fillets with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-6 minutes per side, until cooked through. In a bowl, combine the mangoes, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, honey, and lime juice. Serve the salmon topped with the mango salsa.

ingredients: 2 cans kidney beans, drained and rinsed
cookingMethod: In a large pot, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Add the onions and garlic, and cook until softened. Add the chili powder, cumin, paprika, oregano, and cayenne pepper, and cook for another minute. Add the diced tomatoes and kidney beans, and bring to a simmer. Cover and cook for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Cover and cook for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
